spec_data.Name: texlive-berenisadf
spec_data.Description:
The bundle provides the BerenisADF Pro font collection, in
OpenType and PostScript Type 1 formats, together with support
files to use the fonts in TeXnANSI (LY1) and LaTeX standard T1
and TS1 encodings.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:17:40 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Berenis ADF fonts and TeX/LaTeX support
